short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Press shift and hover a link: it will copy it to the clipboard. Hold the command key too and it will copy it in markdown format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Press shift and hover a link: it will copy it to the clipboard. Hold the command key too and it will copy it in markdown format.
